name: Multitasking 101
description:
Close your eyes and imagine you are a game journalist. You are way behind on deadlines. You have two games you were supposed to have done by today, and you haven't even played either of them!

Now you have to play BOTH games at once! Or make something else up, I don't know why any one would do this for real.

Can you play two games at once? Will you become a multitasking GOD amongst men? Will Senpai ever notice you? Is there even a senpai in this game?! There's only one way to find out!
